name: Typebot
title: typebot.io
shortDescription: Typebot is a no-code platform designed to simplify the creation and integration of chatbots across various platforms like websites and WhatsApp. It's ideal for businesses looking to enhance customer interactions through automated, smart conversations. Users can craft custom chat experiences using a visual editor with over 45 building blocks, making it suitable for marketing, sales, and support.
cons: May require technical knowledge for advanced features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Chatfuel
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers easy chatbot building with AI

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: MobileMonkey
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Strong in SMS and Facebook bots
